title: PLease help, Cyrillic & Greek version or alternative of Cachet
content:
Hi Type specialists,

For a customer of mine who has the Cachet : [http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cachet&x=0&y=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102048/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cachet&x=0&y=0 "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cachet&x=0&y=0")  
as corporate id font, I need to make a folder with Cyrillic and Greek.

Can anybody advise which Greek and Cyrillic fonts I could use to match the Cachet?

Thanks! D.

 [‹ Can anyone identify this contemporary sans?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40797 "Go to previous forum topic") [Elegant Font and Funky Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102048/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40659 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DANNY S

comments.content: [FF DIN Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20080123102048/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_pro/) has Greek and Cyrillic character sets.
Great George and thanks Stephen! D.
